item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: “Health Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from the KFF Health News newsroom to the airwaves each week.

item.title: Pain Clinics Made Millions From ‘Unnecessary’ Injections Into ‘Human Pin Cushions’

item.title: Iowa Medicaid Sends $4M Bills to Two Families Grieving Deaths of Loved Ones With Disabilities
item.description: States are required to claw back health care costs from the estates of many Medicaid recipients. Some, including Iowa, are particularly aggressive in ...

item.title: Journalists Talk Southern Health Care: HIV Drug Access, Medicaid Expansion, Vaccination Rates
item.description: KFF Health News journalists made the rounds on national and local media recently to discuss topical stories. Here’s a collection of their appearances.

item.title: Sights, Sounds Trigger Trauma for Super Bowl Parade Shooting Survivors
item.description: Survivors and witnesses of gun violence often freeze emotionally at first, as a coping mechanism. As the one-year mark since the parade shooting nears...
